author: Berrysoft
body:
1. Install PSCore 6.1 on WSL(Ubuntu 18.04) on Windows 10 1803.
2. Run `pwsh`.
3. Scroll down the shell window some lines.
4. Type some letters.

The letters will still start by the original position of the cursor, and it won't happen to `bash`.

comments.author: ThomasNieto
comments.body: Testing with 7.1 rc1 and bash. I can confirm that the behavior is the same between pwsh and bash. Is this still an issue on 7.1?

title: [PSCore 6.1]PSCore doesn't scroll correctly on WSL
